item.description: I just released Bruce, a Java library for performing cryptography. Here are the relevant links: github docs download There still is much room for improvement. If you are new to open source Java library development, a good place to start is taking a look at the open issues. Most of them are pretty easy. I hope you find this useful. I certainly have in my daily work.
